BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a sign at inaccessible building entrances, public toilets, and elevators giving directions to the nearest available accessible entrance or facility for persons with disabilities when such  entrance or facility exists.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a sign at inaccessible building entrances, public toilets, and elevators giving directions to the nearest available accessible entrance or facility for persons with disabilities.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing September as Suicide Awareness Month in New York City and calling upon government agencies and non-governmental organizations to focus on teen suicide prevention.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Recognizing September as Suicide Awareness Month in NYC.
